text: Michael Whitfield (born 17 October 1962) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Darlington Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Mick Whitfield
